title: Townhome-style floor plans*, Furnished apartment options
posting_body: Use this link for more details:
WELCOME HOME TO PARK VILLAGE IN CONROE, TX
This is a 4 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1360 Sq.
Our selection of 2, 3, and 4 bedroom apartments for rent in Conroe, TX are as affordable as they are stylish and comfortable.
Each home at Park Village Apartments includes many sought after features such as an external storage unit, oversized closets, and a full-size washer and dryer connection.
With a variety of floor plans available, there’s a perfect layout no matter your lifestyle.
Select units are two-story townhomes, offering even more space and privacy.
And with two community playgrounds, swimming pool and a clubhouse on site, Park Village has everything you need to live life to the fullest while staying within your budget.
PET RENT: $20/month per pet (2 max allowed)
Dogs and cats, including puppies and kittens under 1 year old, are welcome at our community.
All pet residents must have their health check and shots, and be spayed or neutered by 6 months of age.
A signed animal addendum is required to be on file at our leasing office.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
